content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position (-18.5, 19.5) - Status: NOT_CONNECTED
- Boiler at position (-13.5, 20.0) - Status: NO_FUEL
- Offshore pump at position (-11.5, 26.5) - Status: WORKING
- Connected pipes forming a fluid system between the offshore pump and boiler.

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position (-17.5, 23.5) - Status: NO_RESEARCH_IN_PROGRESS

### Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position (-21.5, 25.5) - Status: NO_POWER

### Pipe groups
Consists of:
- Multiple pipe groups connecting various entities, including the offshore pump and boiler, facilitating fluid transport.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the positions of the entities you are trying to connect are adjacent and that there are no obstructions in between. Check for existing pipes and their connections.

### Errors when inserting items
- Make sure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into any entity. In this case, ensure you have coal to fuel the boiler.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target position.
